sources.title: Kumo To Churippu
sources.description: Kumo to Tulip (くもとちゅうりっぷ, Kumo to Chūrippu, lit. “Spider and Tulip”) is a short animated Japanese film made in 1943 by Kenzo Masaoka. It is a story about a ladybug being chased by a black-faced spider. The spider catches the ladybug, but then it rains, the spider drowns, and the ladybug is freed by a friendly fly. Watch on RetroFlix.org:  https://retroflix.org/kumo-to-churippu-1943/
